claim: Flublok is approved for adults 18 years and older
explanation: The image is a portion of the official Flublok prescribing information, showing section 1 (Indications and Usage) and section 2 (Dosage and Administration). In the Indications and Usage text it explicitly states: “Flublok is approved for use in persons 18 years of age and older.” This directly confirms that Flublok’s approval is limited to adults aged 18 and up, which supports the claim.
